2.7 Buff 1:
• When an Agent inflicts an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, the enemy's Daze Vulnerability is increased by 30%, and the Daze inflicted on them by Agents is increased by 15% for 15s. Repeated triggers refresh the duration.
• When an enemy enters the Stunned state or Disorder is applied, the whole squad recovers 15 Energy and gains 25% ATK for 15s. Repeated triggers refresh the duration. The Energy Generation effect can be triggered at most once every 30s.
2.7 Buff 2:
• Agent's Ultimate DMG increases by 30%. After launching an Ultimate, the whole squad's Sheer DMG increases by 10% and CRIT DMG increases by 30% for 20s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
• After the Agent causes enemies to become Stunned, their Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 30%.
2.7 Buff 3:
• When there are 2 Agents with the Attack specialty in your squad, the whole squad's ATK is increased by 15%, and CRIT DMG is increased by 30%.
• DMG dealt by the Agent's Basic Attack is increased by 30%, and ignores 15% of the enemy's Ice RES and Electric RES.
Aberration:
• Increases the Agent's Anomaly Buildup Rate by 20%.
• When inflicting Attribute Anomaly on enemies, all squad members gain 60 points of Anomaly Proficiency, and DMG caused by Disorder increases by 40% for 15 seconds.
Adjudication:
• While in Ether Veil, Agent ATK increases by 20%, CRIT DMG increases by 20%.
• Enemy Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 30%, and when Agent Basic Attacks and Ultimates hit enemies, they ignore 10% of Physical RES and 10% of DEF.
Anomaly Surge:
• The Agent's Anomaly Buildup Rate increases by 10%, and when a shield is active, the Anomaly Buildup Rate further increases by 20%.
• When attacking enemies in an Attribute Anomaly state, the Agent's DMG increases by 40%.
Artful:
• Agent DMG increases by 20% and Physical DMG increases by an additional 20%.
• After inflicting an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, the enemy's DEF decreases by 10% for 10s. After inflicting Disorder on an enemy, the enemy's DEF further decreases by 25% for 10s. Each effect's duration refreshes individually.
Blazing Chill:
• The Agent's Fire Anomaly Buildup Rate and Ice Anomaly Buildup Rate increase by 20%, and ATK increases by 25%.
• When inflicting Attribute Anomaly on enemies, the Agent restores 300 Decibels and increases Anomaly Proficiency by 80 points, lasting 15s.
Blazing Chill v2:
• Agent Fire Anomaly Buildup Rate and Ice Anomaly Buildup Rate increase by 20%, and ATK increases by 25%.
• When inflicting an Attribute Anomaly on enemies, the Agent restores 400 Decibels and Anomaly Proficiency is increased by 80, lasting 15s. Decibels recovery can be triggered once every 15s.
Blazing Sweep:
• When an Agent inflicts Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, the enemy's All-Attribute RES decreases by 10%, and their Ether RES decreases by 10% for 15s. Repeated triggers refresh the duration.
• Agent's Attribute Anomaly DMG increases by 15%, their Abloom DMG increases by 15%, and the Anomaly Buildup from their Chain Attacks and Ultimates increases by 20%.
Break Through:
• Agent Sheer DMG increases by 15%. When Agents with Rupture specialty hit enemies with attacks, ignore 20% of the target's All-DMG RES.
• After activating an EX Special Attack, Agent Fire DMG increases by 40% for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Chasing Blade:
• Aftershock DMG from Agents increases by 30% and their CRIT DMG increases by 30%.
• When Agents of Attack specialty hits an enemy with EX Special Attack or Ultimate, the enemy's all DMG RES is reduced by 30% for 15 seconds. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Clarity:
• Agent HP increases by 25%, and their Sheer DMG increases by 15%.
• Agents with Rupture specialty deal 15% more DMG, and their Ultimate DMG is additionally increased by 15%.
Collapse:
• Agent Dodge Counter and EX Special Attack DMG increases by 30%.
• When an Agent hits an enemy that is not Stunned, the Daze dealt increases by 10%. When hitting a Stunned enemy, CRIT DMG increases by 30%, and the enemy's Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 25%.
Combined Attack:
• When there are 1/2 Agents with Attack specialty in the squad, the whole squad's CRIT DMG increases by 20%/60%.
• After an EX Special Attack or Ultimate, the Agent's Electric DMG increases by 20%. For Agents with Attack specialty, their DMG further increases by 30% for 20s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Dazing Force:
• The Agent's Daze value dealt increases by 15%, and the DMG dealt by Chain Attack increases by 60%.
• Each use of Chain Attack increases the all squad members' ATK by 10% for 20 seconds, stacking up to 4 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
Dream Delusion:
• Agent Anomaly Proficiency increases by 40.
• When inflicting Attribute Anomaly on enemies, their DEF is reduced by 10%, and Agent Anomaly DMG against them increases by 20% for 10 seconds. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Electrospark:
• The Agent's Fire DMG and Electric DMG will increase by 25%.
• After triggering Chain Attack, Perfect Assist, or Quick Assist, the Agent's CRIT Rate increases by 20% and CRIT DMG increases by 40% for 20s.
Fiery Assault:
• When there are 1/2 Agents with Attack specialty in the squad, the whole squad deals 20%/40% bonus DMG.
• After triggering a critical hit, the Agent's Electric DMG increases by 30%; for Agents with Attack specialty, their CRIT DMG further increases by 40% for 5s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Final Assault:
• The Agent's Decibel Generation Rate increases by 20%.
• Ultimate DMG increases by 30%. When the Ultimate hits an enemy, it reduces the enemy's DEF by 15% for 20s.
Focus Energy:
• Agent ATK increases by 16%, and enemy Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 30%.
• When in Ether Veil, Agent attacks that hit enemies ignore 10% of Physical RES and 15% of DEF.
Formation Breaker:
• After Stunning enemies, their Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 35%, and their Stun recovery speed decreases by 10%.
• After an Agent uses an EX Special Attack, their CRIT DMG increases by 40% for 20s.
Frost Night:
• Agent Ice DMG and Physical DMG increase by 30%.
• When inflicting Attribute Anomaly on enemies, the whole squad's ATK increases by 25% and Decibel Generation Rate increases by 20% for 20s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Frosty Thunder:
• The Agent's Electric DMG and Ice DMG will increase by 25%.
• DMG dealt by Basic Attack, Dodge Counter, and Dash Attack increases by 40%, ignoring 15% of the enemy's DEF.
Gathering Point:
• Agent Max HP increases by 20%, Ultimate DMG increases by 40%.
• After using an EX Special Attack, Energy and Adrenaline Generation Rate increase by 20% and Ether DMG increases by 35% for 20s, and repeated triggers reset the duration.
Graceful Mastery:
• Increases Agent Anomaly Buildup Rate by 25% and Anomaly Proficiency by 40.
• When an enemy suffers an Attribute Anomaly, Agents recover 500 additional Decibels and ATK increases by 30% for 15s. The Decibel recovery effect can trigger once every 15s.
Harnessing Change:
• Ultimate DMG increases by 30%. When launching Ultimate, the Agent's ATK increases by 15% for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
• After enemies become Stunned, their Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 35%.
Heartcrusher:
• Agent CRIT DMG increases by 30%.
• ATK of Agents with Attack specialty increases by 10%. Their Basic Attack DMG increases by 30% and ignore 15% of enemy DEF.
Illusory Surge:
• Agent Ether Anomaly Buildup Rate and Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate increases by 20%, Anomaly Proficiency increases by 60.
• When an Agent hits enemies affected by Attribute Anomaly, DMG dealt increases by 25% and ignores 15% of enemy DEF.
Interrupt:
• Basic Attack, Dodge Counter, EX Special Attack, and Dash Attack DMG increases by 30%.
• After triggering a Perfect Dodge or Perfect Assist, increases all squad members' ATK by 10% and CRIT DMG by 10% for 15s. Stacks up to 3 times. The duration of each stack is calculated separately.
Lingering Illness:
• After Stunning enemies, their Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 25%, and their Stun recovery speed decreases by 10%.
• After an Agent uses a Chain Attack, their ATK increases by 20% and CRIT DMG by 30% for 20s.
Meditation:
• Agent Max HP increases by 30%, Ultimate DMG increases by 40%.
• After using an Ultimate, Energy and Adrenaline Generation Rate increase by 15%, Ether DMG and Ice DMG increase by 40% for 20s.
Metamorphosis:
• Agent Fire Anomaly Buildup Rate and Ether Anomaly Buildup Rate is increased by 20%, and Anomaly Proficiency by 80.
• When triggering an Attribute Anomaly, the enemy's DEF is reduced by 15%, and the damage they receive from Attribute Anomalies will be increased by 40% for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Mutation:
• Agent ATK increases by 25%, Anomaly Proficiency increases by 40.
• After inflicting Attribute Anomaly on enemies, their All-DMG RES is reduced by 10%, and Agent Attribute Anomaly DMG against them is increased by 30% for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Overthrow:
• Increases Agent Daze by 25% and Chain Attack DMG by 80%.
• When a Chain Attack is triggered, the Agent recovers 20 Energy, and DMG increases by 50% for 20s.
Overwhelming Might:
• Agent Max HP increases by 30%, Ultimate DMG increases by 40%.
• After using an Ultimate, Energy and Adrenaline Generation Rate increase by 15%, Ether DMG and Fire DMG increase by 40% for 20s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Pinnacle:
• Rupture specialty Agent Sheer DMG increases by 10%, and reduces Miasma Shield 30% faster.
• While in Ether Veil, Agent Sheer DMG additionally increases by 30%, and hitting an enemy makes its Stun DMG Multiplier increase by 45% for 10s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Power Boost:
• For Agents, Electric DMG and Physical DMG increase by 30%.
• When inflicting Attribute Anomaly on enemies, for the whole squad, ATK increases by 8% and Decibel Generation Rate increases by 8% for 20s, stacking up to 4 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Power On:
• Agent Assist Attacks, EX Special Attacks, and Ultimates deal 25% more DMG.
• When an Agent triggers Quick Assist or Chain Attack, Decibel Generation Rate increases by 30%, and attacks ignore 20% of enemy RES for 20s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Psychics:
• After an Agent inflicts an Attribute Anomaly on an enemy, the enemy's All-Attribute RES is reduced by 10%, and Ether RES is reduced by 15% for 15s. Repeated triggers refresh the duration.
• Agent EX Special Attack, Chain Attack, and Ultimate Anomaly Buildup increases by 15%. Agent Attribute Anomaly DMG increases by 15%, and Abloom DMG increases by 20%.
Raging Storm:
• Agent Special Attack, EX Special Attack, and Ultimate DMG increases by 30%.
• When an EX Special Attack or Aftershock hits the enemy, the Agent's CRIT DMG increases by 30% for 20s, and the enemy's DEF is reduced by 15% for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Raging Waves:
• When an Agent with Rupture specialty has HP below 80%/50% of their Max HP, their attacks ignore 10%/25% of the enemy's Ice RES.
• When Agents activate or extend an Ether Veil, the whole squad's Sheer DMG increases by 20%, CRIT DMG increases by 30% for 20s, repeated triggers reset the duration.
Rapid Aid:
• The Agent's Energy Generation Rate increases by 25%, and the DMG dealt by Quick Assist increases by 50%.
• Each use of Quick Assist increases all squad members' ATK by 10% for 20s, stacking up to 3 times. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Ride the Current:
• Agents within Ether Veil have their ATK increased by 15%, and when their Basic Attack or Ultimate hits an enemy, it ignores 15% of enemy DEF.
• After an Agent with Support specialty activates an EX Special Attack, the whole squad's Physical DMG increases by 20% and their CRIT DMG increases by 40% for 20s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Sever Pulse:
• Agent Ultimate DMG increases by 30%, and when Agents Stun enemies, their Stun DMG Multiplier increases by 50%.
• After Agents with the Stun specialty use EX Special Attack, when any squad member's attacks hit enemies, ignore 7% All-Attribute RES for 30s, stacking up to 3 times, and the duration of each stack is calculated separately.
Shatterboon:
• Agent Electric DMG and Physical DMG increase by 20%. When Basic Attack, Chain Attack, or Ultimate hits an enemy, CRIT DMG increases by 30%.
• While within Ether Veil, Agent ATK increases by 10%, and attacks ignore 15% of enemy DEF.
Sonata:
• Agent Decibel Generation Rate increases by 20%.
• Ultimates and EX Special Attacks ignore 20% of DMG RES on hit. After an Ultimate hits enemies, Agent Ultimate and EX Special Attack DMG increase by 50% for 30s, repeated triggers reset the duration.
Spirit Break:
• Increases Agent Anomaly Buildup Rate by 30% and Disorder DMG by 40%.
• When inflicting Disorder on an enemy, recovers all squad members' Energy by 10 and increases Agent's ATK by 25% for 30s. The Energy Generation effect can trigger once every 20s.
Swift Advance:
• DMG dealt by Agent Aftershocks and Chain Attacks is increased by 30%.
• When an Aftershock or Dodge Counter hits an enemy, all squad members' ATK is increased by 15%, and CRIT DMG is increased by 40% for 20s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Swift Resolution: • Agent ATK increases by 20%, Decibel Generation Rate increases by 20%. Upon launching an Ultimate, Agent ATK increases by an additional 15% for 15s. Ultimate DMG increases by 40%, Daze dealt increases by 20%, and Anomaly Buildup increases by 20%.
Tempering Body:
• Agents deal 20% more DMG and attacks ignore 10% of enemy All-DMG RES.
• Attack specialty Agents' ATK increases by 20%, Basic Attack DMG increases by 40%, and ignore 20% of enemy DEF.
Transformation Charge:
• Agent Ether Anomaly Buildup Rate and Physical Anomaly Buildup Rate is increased by 25%, and Anomaly Proficiency by 60 points.
• When triggering an Attribute Anomaly, the enemy's DEF is reduced by 10%, and the damage they receive from Attribute Anomalies will be increased by 30% for 20s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
Worn Out:
• The Daze dealt by Agents is increased by 10%, and the DMG dealt by Chain Attacks is increased by 50%.
• When Chain Attacks hit an enemy, the enemy's Stun DMG Multiplier is increased by 25%, and all squad members' ATK is increased by 20% for 15s. Repeated triggers reset the duration.
